assessment_item.title: ಅತಿ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಳೆ ಮತ್ತು ಅಧಿಕ ಉಷ್ಣಾಂಶದ ಪ್ರದೇಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಈ ಮಣ್ಣು ನಿರ್ಮಾಣಗೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತದೆ.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಅತಿ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಳೆ ಮತ್ತು ಅಧಿಕ ಉಷ್ಣಾಂಶದ ಪ್ರದೇಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಈ ಮಣ್ಣು ನಿರ್ಮಾಣಗೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತದೆ.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಮೆಕ್ಕಲು ಮಣ್ಣು  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2735"},{"text":"

ಮರುಭೂಮಿ ಮಣ್ಣು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2736"},{"text":"

ಕೆಂಪು ಮಣ್ಣು 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2746"},{"text":"

 ಕಪ್ಪು ಮಣ್ಣು
